MyCaseStudies.title: Tea Stall Innovation During COVID
MyCaseStudies.subtitle: Organic Snacks | Zero Plastic | 3x Sales Growth
MyCaseStudies.problem: During COVID, tea stall business was hit due to fewer customers and hygiene concerns.
MyCaseStudies.solution: Introduced handmade organic snacks with long shelf life and zero plastic packaging based on customer observations. Marketed it via word of mouth.
impact: 3x business growth within a few months

MyCaseStudies.title: Siva E-Corner Digital Access
MyCaseStudies.subtitle: Government Services Made Easy
MyCaseStudies.problem: Users found it difficult to access or understand various e-governance services provided through CSC and e-Sevai centers.
MyCaseStudies.solution: Designed a centralized platform where users can search for services, know required documents, fees, and processing time.
impact: Increased digital engagement with local services
